Header.title: Migration Research Cell (MRC)
Header.paragraph: The Migration Research Cell (MRC) was established in May 2024 at the Department of Political Science, University of Peshawar, to inform policy-making, support humanitarian interventions and develop stakeholdersâ€™ networks related to migration through rigorous research on global, regional, and national trends in migration and the impacts of migration on societies, economies, and politics.
